# UIPasteControl.DisplayMode

**Enumeration**

Options that determine whether a paste button composes an icon, textual label, or both.

## Declaration

```swift
enum DisplayMode
```

## Overview

The paste button ([doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIPasteControl]) property [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIPasteControl/Configuration-swift.class/displayMode] is of this type.

## Choosing a display mode

- **UIPasteControl.DisplayMode.iconAndLabel**: A display mode for a button that composes an icon and a textual label.
- **UIPasteControl.DisplayMode.iconOnly**: A display mode for an icon button.
- **UIPasteControl.DisplayMode.labelOnly**: A display mode for a textual label.

## Enumeration Cases

- **UIPasteControl.DisplayMode.arrowAndLabel**

## Initializers

- **init(rawValue:)**

## Pasteboard

- **UIPasteControl**: A button that a person taps to place pasteboard contents in your app.
- **UIPasteControl.Configuration**: An object that determines a paste button’s color, corner style, icon, and text.
- **UIPasteboard**: An object that helps a user share data from one place to another within your app, and from your app to other apps.
- **UIPasteConfiguration**: The interface that an object implements to declare its ability to accept specific data types for pasting and for drag-and-drop activities.
- **UIPasteConfigurationSupporting**: The interface that determines whether a responder object supports paste configuration.

## Conforms To

- BitwiseCopyable
- Equatable
- Hashable
- RawRepresentable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
